Html:
Hi,

I made a program from the beginning based on the example, but I'm having some problems with the cached map. When I use the example the map can open, but when I do exactly the same on my program the tiles show blue error. I've already checked everything, is there something missing?

cheers!

In my program I get:

"Exception: No data in local tile cache...

We are sorry, but we don't have imagery at this zoom level for the region."
appears you use CacheOnly mode, and you have no tiles in cache, so prefetch your data or use ServerAndCache mode
now it's working. Can I prefetch 2 maps for the same file? cause I want to use Bing and Bing Hybrid. Or I can use two different files?
you can use two or more, by default it puts all tiles from all providers into one database, i recommend put big cache into separate database and leave default one for small updates
